rule.description: Deep Instinct $(deep.Action) $(deep.MitreTechnique) attack on $(deep.Hostname) ($(dstip)) [$(deep.Company)] at $(timestamp) - User: $(dstuser) - FilePath: $(deep.FilePath) - Policy: $(deep.Policy)

Deep Instinct $(name) $(deep.Action) $(deep.ThreatType) threat ($(deep.MitreTechnique), $(deep.MitreId)) on $(deep.Hostname)($(dstip)) [$(deep.Company)] - FilePath: $(deep.FilePath) - Policy: $(deep.Policy)
